meanings.definition: Having leaflets arranged in pairs on each side of a common axis.
meanings.sent1: The bipinnately leaves of the plant were neatly aligned in pairs.
meanings.sent2: The bipinnately arranged leaves gave the tree a unique appearance.
meanings.sent3: The bipinnately placed leaves looked like little green wings on the stem.
meanings.sent4: The bipinnately structured leaves resembled a ladder reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The bipinnately positioned leaves made the plant look like a green fan.

meanings.definition: With leaflets arranged in pairs on each side of a common axis.
meanings.sent1: She admired the bipinnately patterned leaves on the vine.
meanings.sent2: The bipinnately positioned leaflets fluttered gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The bipinnately placed leaflets seemed to be dancing on the stem.
meanings.sent4: The bipinnately arranged leaflets created a symmetrical design on the plant.
meanings.sent5: The bipinnately structured leaves added a touch of elegance to the garden.
